title: Georgia Firm Recalls Chicken Nugget Product Due To Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 12, 2014 Perdue, a Gainesville, Ga. establishment, is recalling approximately 15,306 pounds of frozen, fully cooked chicken nugget product that may be contaminated with extraneous materials, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's FSIS announced today. The following product is subject to recall: [View Labels...
impacted_products: 8-oz. box of “APPLEGATE naturals CHICKEN NUGGETS” bearing the establishment number “P2617” and the “BEST BEFORE” date of “02/05/15”.
